reference.title: cxxVariableStorageClassSpecifierStatic
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxVariableStorageClassSpecifierStatic> element marks this variable as static.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxVariableStorageClassSpecifierStatic> element has no children. <cxxVariableStorageClassSpecifierStatic> can have the fixed attributes name and value both of which are set to "static".

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxVariableDefinition> <cxxVariableAccessSpecifier value="private"/> <cxxVariableStorageClassSpecifierStatic/> <cxxVariableDeclaredType>const <apiRelation href="e32def_8h.xml#e32def_8h_1a8094a5c8ef3bcf6221e5ff6405127d34">TText</apiRelation> *const</cxxVariableDeclaredType> <cxxVariableScopedName>GlyphSample</cxxVariableScopedName> <cxxVariablePrototype>static const TText *const KTScript2GlyphSample[]</cxxVariablePrototype> <cxxVariableNameLookup>GlyphSample::KTScript2GlyphSample</cxxVariableNameLookup> <cxxVariableAPIItemLocation> <cxxVariableDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="C:/epoc32/include/graphics/gdi/glyphsample.h"/> <cxxVariableDeclarationFileLine name="lineNumber" value="53"/> </cxxVariableAPIItemLocation> </cxxVariableDefinition>
